Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 56 %

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of rain beginning this morning. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 except gusting to 60 along parts of the coast this afternoon. High 7. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending late this evening then cloudy. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NDT Tuesday 03 May 2016

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High 8 except plus 4 in onshore winds.
